# cranology

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of {cranology} is to provide tools to scrape data from CRAN and MRAN websites.

## Installation

You can install the development version of {cranology} like so:

``` r
remotes::install_github("ThinkR-open/cranology")
```

## Example

```{r example}
library(cranology)
```

```{r}
dates <- seq(
  from = as.Date("2018-04-10", "%Y-%m-%d"), 
  by = "1 year", 
  length.out = 4
)
cran_get_package_number_mran(dates)
```
